---
title: Read User

---

Get user's information by `user_id`.

###### GET /users/:id

```
// cURL Example
curl -i -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..TC5327AW_74W3ou0zXlBhzMuBPeE75iEK4ESKaCGlh-7vDixlJ8vKhIalUQ8qVHEHvCpSFCc-B4imQ0h4ICjrVuL1Is_JOaXx-nI_Pegb5tkWszCeFMYCXUBeBUFH6ACaZyP-VwUiT4_Ro5l1EjziCGix0GcKAjApqf1m25Pz10" "https://api.mixin.one/users/06aed1e3-bd77-4a59-991a-5bb5ae6fbb09"
```
```
{{ site.data.member.data }}
```
